item.title: Five reasons Brian Kelly failed at LSU
item.description: Kelly's departure could be pinned on trouble with his staff, trouble fitting in or a mad scramble for Lane Kiffin.

item.title: 'When we were at our lowest, the man didn't blink': What Cade Cunningham is building in Detroit
item.description: Cade Cunningham is looking to level up in 2025-26. And he wants to take his Pistons with him.

item.title: Solak: Why Drake Maye should be MVP, a defense of Caleb Williams, four trades that must happen
item.description: Here are four takes off the first eight weeks of the season, four trade proposals that make a ton of sense and some wild Week 8 trends to watch.

item.title: A new team at No. 1? Patriots in the top 10? We have our latest NFL Power Rankings
item.description: Let's update our NFL Power Rankings ahead of Week 9. Plus, we picked the best offseason signing, hiring or draft pick for each roster.

item.title: The top reason to watch every NHL team in the Frozen Frenzy
item.description: Here's a viewer's guide to each club, with all 32 in action on Tuesday.
